00026 #ifndef TAGLIB_AUDIOPROPERTIES_H
00027 #define TAGLIB_AUDIOPROPERTIES_H
00028 
00029 #include "taglib_export.h"
00030 
00031 namespace TagLib {
00032 
00034 
00042   class TAGLIB_EXPORT AudioProperties
00043   {
00044   public:
00045 
00053     enum ReadStyle {
00055       Fast,
00057       Average,
00059       Accurate
00060     };
00061 
00065     virtual ~AudioProperties();
00066 
00070     virtual int length() const = 0;
00071 
00077     virtual int bitrate() const = 0;
00078 
00082     virtual int sampleRate() const = 0;
00083 
00087     virtual int channels() const = 0;
00088 
00089   protected:
00090 
00098     AudioProperties(ReadStyle style);
00099 
00100   private:
00101     AudioProperties(const AudioProperties &);
00102     AudioProperties &operator=(const AudioProperties &);
00103 
00104     class AudioPropertiesPrivate;
00105     AudioPropertiesPrivate *d;
00106   };
00107 
00108 }
00109 
00110 #endif
